item.title: Diddy and the Deep State
item.description: How a decades-old sushi party, federal trial and sprawling online conspiracy community turned Sean “Diddy” Combs into the latest QAnon obsession.

item.title: Sean “Diddy” Combs’ Lawyers Now Seeking Acquittal on Guilty Verdicts, Months Ahead of His Sentencing
item.description: The court should adopt a narrow view of the Mann Act, the legal team states in a new filing, calling its application in Sean Combs’ circumstances “unprecedented.”

item.title: Sean “Diddy” Combs’ Lawyers Now Seeking Acquittal on Guilty Verdicts, Months Ahead of His Sentencing
item.description: The court should adopt a narrow view of the Mann Act, the legal team states in a new filing, calling its application in Sean Combs’ circumstances “unprecedented.”

item.title: From Martha to Diddy, Trial Sketch Artist Draws History Live From the Courtroom
item.description: Elizabeth Williams has sketched some of the biggest trials of the past 30 years as the new business has shifted around her: “It’s social media. Dilution.”

item.title: Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’ Attorneys File Motion for His Release From Brooklyn Lockup
item.description: His team wrote that “there has literally never been a case like this one,” as Combs remains jailed until his Oct. 3 sentencing hearing.
